name: Posix.IO

aliases.name: Process
aliases.type: { argv : List.List String.String, pid : Basics.Int, env : Dict.Dict String.String String.String }

values.name: andThen
values.comment:
Compose IO actions, `andThen` style

    File.open "file.txt"
        |> exitOnError identity
        |> andThen
            (\fd ->
                File.write fd "Hello, World"
            )
values.type: (a -> Posix.IO.IO b) -> Posix.IO.IO a -> Posix.IO.IO b

values.name: combine
values.comment: Perform IO in sequence

values.name: do
values.comment:
Compose IO actions, do-notation style.

    do (File.open "file.txt" |> exitOnError identity) <| \fd ->
    do (File.write fd "Hello, World")
values.type: Posix.IO.IO a -> (a -> Posix.IO.IO b) -> Posix.IO.IO b

values.name: exitOnError
values.comment: Print to stderr and exit program on `Err`
values.type: (error -> String.String) -> Posix.IO.IO (Result.Result error a) -> Posix.IO.IO a

values.name: program
values.comment:
module HelloUser exposing (program)

    import Dict exposing (Dict)
    import Posix.IO as IO exposing (IO, Process)
    import Posix.IO.File as File

    helloUser : Process -> IO ()
    helloUser process =
        let
            userName =
                Dict.get "USER" process.env
                    |> Maybe.withDefault "Unknown"
        in
        File.write File.stdOut userName

    program : IO.PosixProgram
    program =
        IO.program helloUser

name: Posix.IO.File

aliases.name: Stats
aliases.type: { size : Basics.Int, atime : Basics.Float, mtime : Basics.Float, ctime : Basics.Float }

values.name: contentsOf
values.comment: Read the contents of a file.

values.name: flagAppend
values.comment:
Open file for appending (writing at the end of a file). (`a`)

The file is created if it does not exist.
The stream is positioned at the end of the file.

values.name: flagAppendPlus
values.comment:
Open file for reading and appending. (`a+`)

The file is created if it does not exist.
The stream is positioned at the end of the file.

values.name: flagRead
values.comment:
Open file for reading. (`r`)

An error occurs if the file does not exist.
The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.

values.name: flagReadPlus
values.comment:
Open file for reading and writing. (`r+`)

An exception occurs if the file does not exist.
The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.

values.name: flagWrite
values.comment:
Open file for writing. (`w`)

The file is created (if it does not exist) or truncated (if it exists).
The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.

values.name: flagWritePlus
values.comment:
Open file for reading and writing. (`w+`)

The file is created (if it does not exist) or truncated (if it exists).
The stream is positioned at the beginning of the file.

values.name: open
values.comment: Open a file
values.type: Posix.IO.File.Filename -> Posix.IO.File.Flag a -> Posix.IO.File.IO (Result.Result String.String (Posix.IO.File.FD a))

values.name: read
values.comment: Read a file

values.name: readDir
values.comment: Read the contents of a directory.

values.name: stat
values.comment: Read file stats

values.name: stdErr
values.comment: Standard Error

values.name: stdIn
values.comment: Standard Int

values.name: stdOut
values.comment: Standard Out

values.name: write
values.comment: Write to a file

values.name: writeContentsTo
values.comment:
Write contents to a file. The Program will fail
if there is a problem.

values.name: exit
values.comment: Exit Program with a status.

values.name: logErr
print
